title: McDonald's customer threw food at worker who then broke her face with blender
text:
Britany Price threw food at a McDonald’s worker after being made to wait 25 minutes for a refund – only for the manager to hurl a blender back at Price’s face, leaving her with a shattered cheekbone and broken nose (Pictures: WPBF)

A McDonald’s customer was left with a shattered cheekbone and nose after a restaurant manager hurled a huge blender at her face.

Britany Price was struck hard on the face with the kitchen tool after hurling her order at the worker at the McDonald’s in Colerain Township, Ohio, on September 22.

Price, who has undergone surgery to repair the damage caused, said: ‘I wanted to get some Happy Meals and some cheeseburgers and that was a very unhappy day for me.’

The incident began when Price used the restaurant’s drive-thru to order some food – only to then discover she’d been given the wrong thing.

Price went back in to the restaurant to complain, but lost patience after being left unattended for 23 minutes.

She then hurled the bags of food at the worker, only for the manager to hit back with an airborne blender, which struck Price’s face so hard she was knocked to the ground.

Price told WPBF: ‘It’s like, you’re directly ignoring me, so what choice do I have? I don’t have to put up with this.

‘So, I went and got the food, I want my money back and that’s kind of where it all goes from there.’

Asked if she regretted hurling the blender, Price added: ‘I mean, I definitely don’t feel like there would have been a different result.

‘I feel like even if we would have just went verbal back and forth that it still would’ve escalated to something else.’

Britany Price shows the injuries she received after being struck on the face by a blender after an argument at McDonald’s

The injured customer’s lawyer has now filed a civil lawsuit against McDonald’s.

A spokesman for the restaurant said: ‘The safety of our customers and employees is of utmost importance to us.

‘We are looking into this matter and will take the appropriate steps once our investigation is complete.’
description: Britany Price hurled the Happy Meals after being left waiting 23 minutes for help - only for a restaurant manager to respond by throwing a huge blender back at her
